name: Preparation Ritual
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Spellbooks/Spellbooks/Arctic Call (Level 11 Evoker)/Preparation Ritual

sections.body: You infuse your spell with a biting cold that few can withstand. Spend this boon as a free action when you cast a spell with the cold descriptor. Any damage from that spell ignores all resistance to cold, but does not ignore immunity to cold.
sections.name: Rime Bite
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Spellbooks/Spellbooks/Arctic Call (Level 11 Evoker)/Preparation Ritual/Rime Bite
